mapper.sql: id, title, code, instanceid, name, metaid, createtime, remark, tenantId, busiid, businessKey,year,userId,userName,isback,isrevoke,busicode
mapper.insert: insert into bpm_todo (title, code, instanceid, name, metaid, createtime, remark, tenantId, busiid, businessKey,year,userId,userName,busicode) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{metaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{busicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bpm_todo (title, code, instanceid, name, metaid, createtime, remark, tenantId, busiid, businessKey,year,userId,userName,busicode)values
(#{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.metaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.busiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.busicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bpm_todo set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instanceid = #{instanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, metaid = #{metaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, busiid = #{busiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessKey = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tenantId = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select a.*,b.busipath,b.businame from bpm_todo a,meta_busi b
order by ${sort} ${dir}

select a.*,b.busipath,b.businame from bpm_todo a,meta_busi b
order by ${sort} ${dir}

select a.*,b.busipath,b.businame from bpm_todo a,meta_busi b where a.metaid=b.metaid and a.tenantId=b.tenantId and a.instanceid in
'${item}'
